label: Orch-OR Gravitational Collapse Time
mathematical_goal: Estimate Penrose-Hameroff Orch-OR collapse timescale from gravitational self-energy
theoretical_significance: The Orch-OR (Orchestrated Objective Reduction) theory proposes that quantum coherence in microtubules collapses on a timescale tau = hbar/E_G where E_G is gravitational self-energy. For E_G ~ 10^-32 J (tubulin superposition), this gives tau ~ 10 ms, matching neural processing timescales. PM provides geometric context for this speculative framework.
